entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
